attributes.action: Ensure vaccination for Covid 19 is available free of charge to all who want it
attributes.additional_details: To avoid any possible pre selection, by gender, age, ethnicity, social class, or residential area, which could be open to prejudice or influence, this government must ensure that all those who request the vaccine have it provided free from any direct cost to the receiver.
attributes.background: If/when a vaccination for Covid 19 is available, having passed clinical trial, this government should ensure that it is provided to all UK residents who would like it, free of any fees or charges.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

signatures_by_constituency.mp: Rt Hon Sir Desmond Swayne MP
